pageProduct.name: Systane Ultra Multi Dose Preservative Free Lubricant Eye Drops 10ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Are you looking for a fast relief eye drop for your irritated, tired, dry eyes?

Don't let dry eye symptoms caused by environmental factors such as screen time, air quality and/or seasonal changes (i.e. low humidity, high winds, dust) slow you down.

Same formula as Systane® ULTRA, now preservative-free in a bottle, Systane® ULTRA Preservative-free eye drop contains the unique ingredient HP-Guar® to deliver fast-acting relief for your irritated, tired, dry eyes and it's also suitable to use with soft contact lenses.

Upgrade to Systane ULTRA Preservative-free today!

*IQVIA 01 TEARS S1K SELL-IN VALUE MAT 2021-02.

References: 1. Gokul, A. et al. Cont Lens Anterior Eye 2018; 41: 97-100.

ALWAYS READ THE LABEL. FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS FOR USE.

IF SYMPTOMS PERSIST, TALK TO YOUR HEALTH PROFESSIONAL

^Sodium hyaluronate, the salt form of hyaluronic acid.

Reference: 1. Rangarajan et al. J Ocul Pharmacol Th. 2019; 35(1): 32-37 (Sponsored by Novartis). 2. Gokul, A. et al. Cont Lens Anterior Eye 2018; 41: 97-100. 3. Rangarajan, R., et al. (2015) . J Ocul Pharmacol Ther. 31 (8). p.491-497. Systane Ultra Lubricating Eye Drops is a sterile solution containing Polyethylene Glycol 400, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Sorbitol, Aminomethylpropanol, Boric Acid, Potassium Chloride, Sodium Chloride and Polyquad (a trademark of Novartis ) (Polyquaternium-1) 0.001% Preservative. Do not use if allergic to any of these ingredients. ©2021 Alcon AU; Auckland NZ: 0800 101 106. ANZ-SYB-2100003

General Information

Systane Ultra Preservative-Free Lubricant Eye Drops 10mL

For the temporary relief of burning and irritation due to dryness of the eyes. May also be used for rewetting of all silicone hydrogel and soft contact lenses for minor irritation, discomfort and blurring. Preservative-free formula.

Product Claims: Preservative-Free Fast-Acting Dry Eye Relief

Size: 10mL

Warnings

OPHTHALMIC USE ONLY

Ingredients

Polyethylene Glycol 400
Propylene Glycol
Hydroxypropyl Guar
Sorbitol
Aminomethylpropanol
Potassium Chloride
Sodium Chloride

Contains: Systane Ultra Lubricant Eye Drops is a sterile solution containing polyethylene glycol 400, propylene glycol, hydroxypropyl guar, sorbitol, aminomethylpropanol, boric acid, potassium chloride, and sodium chloride.

Directions

May be used as needed throughout the day.
BEFORE FIRST USE, hold the bottle at approximately 90-degree angle and dispense one drop of the product to discard. Shake the bottle downward to remove residual product.
Place 1 or 2 drops in the affected eye(s) as needed and blink.
While wearing contact lenses, if minor irritation, discomfort, or blurring occurs, place 1 or 2 drops on the affected eye(s) and blink 2 or 3 times. May also be used prior to and after contact lens wear.
After use, before closing the cap on the bottle, shake the bottle downward to remove residual product that may be left on the tip.
Do not touch tip of container to any surface to avoid contamination. Replace cap after use.
